snippet: Representative Ron Paul optimistically predicts his campaign will send nearly 500 delegates - whether bound or in spirit - to the Republican National Convention.
abstract: Representative Ron Paul optimistically predicts his campaign will send nearly 500 delegates - whether bound or in spirit - to the Republican National Convention.

headline.main: No Nomination, but Paul Predicts Strong Contingent at G.O.P. Convention
headline.print_headline: On To Tampa: Ron Paul’s Delegate Math
